DOC.brief_summary: This study intend investigate patient satisfaction treatment Ointment ( W/O emulsion ) formulation Potency Class II topical corticosteroid ( TCs ) atopic dermatitis ( AD ) patient Japan . Objectives include measure patient satisfaction , treatment adherence , itchiness , AD severity score .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Investigating Treatment Satisfaction Atopic Dermatitis Patients Who Have Switched Ointment ( W/O Emulsion ) Formulation Very Strong Class Topical Corticosteroids
DOC.criteria: Female male patient diagnosis atopic dermatitis treat Fatty Ointment Potency Class II ( Very strong class ) TCs Patients schedule change formulation Potency Class II TC Fatty Ointment Ointment ( Water Oil ; Water per Oil emulsion ) per investigator 's routine treatment practice Patients age 20 Patients able understand sign write informed consent Patients participate investigational program intervention outside routine clinical practice Patients contraindication TCs Patients regard ineligible investigator Patients pregnant breastfeeding For Period 2 ( SpringSummer ) , patient enrol Period 1
